pages.text: The Fluidizer can process materials in the following three different modes, depending on the type and number of Injectors in the machine:$(br2)$(li)$(o)Solid mode: $() turns solid fuel sources (like ingots) into fluid fuel. To enable this mode, you need one, and only one, Solid Injector in the machine

$(li)$(o)Solid Mixing mode: $() turns two solid fuel sources (like ingots) into fluid and mixes them to create a new fuel type. To enable this mode, you need two, and only two, Solid Injectors in the machine.$(li)$(o)Fluid Mixing mode: $() mixes two fluid fuels into a new fuel type. To enable this mode, you need two, and only two, Fluid Injectors in the machine.
